about_the_game:
Welcome to Glitch Gears, a unique arcade-style driving game where the essence of speed meets strategy. This game marries the nostalgic feel of old-school arcade racers with modern visual effects, offering both a nod to the past and a fresh gameplay experience.

In Glitch Gears, your goal is to dodge traffic, avoid head-on collisions, and keep your speed up. The challenge? Don't let the police catch you. It's a game where your reflexes are as important as your strategy, bringing excitement and urgency to every moment on the road.

Speed isn't just about survival - it's your path to greater rewards. As you accelerate and maintain higher speeds, your gears shift upward, multiplying the experience points you earn. Push your limits to reach maximum gear for the biggest rewards, but remember: one wrong move could send you back to first gear. This creates an thrilling risk-reward dynamic where every second at top speed counts.

Drawing inspiration from the Auto Shooter Survivors genre, Glitch Gears evolves as you play. Level up, acquire power-ups, and navigate through the chaos of the roads. It’s a game that combines growth with challenge, ensuring every level feels like a new test.

Our control scheme is straightforward and minimalist, designed to be responsive and easy to master. This ensures you can weave through dense traffic and reach breakneck speeds. Experience the excitement of high-speed chases and strategic gameplay with Glitch Gears.
